titre: üèÜMakita DGA404 125mm/100mm Brushless Lithium Electric Angle Grinder Rechargeable Cutting Machine High Power Polishing Machine
description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile angle grinder designed for demanding cutting, grinding, and polishing applications. With its brushless motor and compact design, it delivers exceptional performance and control.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers increased power and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors, extending runtime and reducing wear.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the speed according to the material being worked on for optimal results.
  • Spindle Lock Button: Simplifies disc changes for quick and easy tool maintenance.
  • Anti-Kickback Protection: Features a mechanism that helps prevent sudden and dangerous tool rotations during cutting operations, enhancing user safety.
  • Lightweight and Compact Design: Provides excellent maneuverability and comfort during prolonged use.

Specifications

The Makita DGA404 accepts both 125mm and 100mm discs, offering versatility for different applications. It runs on a powerful Makita Li-ion battery (sold separately) providing ample power for demanding tasks.

  • Disc Diameter: 125mm / 100mm
  • No-Load Speed: Variable speed control, offering a range suitable for various applications.
  • Battery Type: Makita Li-ion (sold separately)

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 offers numerous benefits for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • High Power Output: Delivers exceptional cutting, grinding, and polishing performance.
  • Increased Efficiency: The brushless motor reduces energy consumption and extends runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Enhanced Control: Variable speed control and the compact design allow for precise and comfortable operation.
  • Improved Safety: Anti-kickback protection minimizes the risk of dangerous tool rotations during use.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Cutting metal, stone, and other materials.
  • Grinding welds, removing rust, and smoothing surfaces.
  • Polishing metal and concrete to achieve a smooth finish.

titre: ‚úÖMakita DGA404 125mm Brushless Electric Angle Grinder Grinding Machine DIY Woodworking Power Tool Adapt For Makita 18V Batteryüîã
description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile brushless electric angle grinder designed for demanding DIY projects and professional woodworking. This compact tool boasts impressive performance with its high-speed motor and durable construction, making it ideal for tackling various tasks such as cutting metal, grinding welds, sharpening tools, and smoothing surfaces.

  • Brushless Motor Technology: Delivers exceptional power and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows for precise adjustments to match the application and material being worked on.
  • Spindle Lock: Simplifies the process of changing grinding discs quickly and easily.
  • Ergonomic Design: Features a comfortable grip and balanced weight distribution for reduced user fatigue during prolonged use.
  • Protective Guard: Shields the operator from flying debris and enhances safety during operation.

Specifications

This angle grinder is compatible with Makita 18V batteries, providing a cordless and convenient power source.

The DGA404 features a 125mm grinding disc size, offering versatility for various applications.

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 angle grinder offers numerous benefits for both DIY enthusiasts and professionals:

  • Increased Power: The brushless motor technology provides a significant boost in power compared to traditional grinders, allowing you to tackle tougher tasks with ease.
  • Enhanced Durability: Constructed from robust materials, this grinder is built to withstand demanding use and provide long-lasting performance.
  • Improved Control: Variable speed control allows for precise adjustments based on the material and task at hand, ensuring optimal results.
  • Cordless Convenience: Compatibility with Makita 18V batteries eliminates the hassle of cords and provides greater freedom of movement.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 angle grinder is a versatile tool suitable for a wide range of applications:

  • Cutting metal, tile, stone, and other hard materials.
  • Grinding welds and removing excess material.
  • Sharpening tools such as chisels, blades, and axes.
  • Smoothing surfaces and preparing them for finishing.

Always follow the manufacturer's instructions and safety guidelines when operating this tool. Wear appropriate protective gear, including eye protection, gloves, and hearing protection.

Features

The Makita DHP487 Cordless Brushless Electric Impact Screwdriver Drill is a powerful and versatile tool designed for both professional and DIY users. Its brushless motor delivers high torque and speed, making it ideal for a wide range of applications, from driving screws to drilling into metal.

Specifications

This impact screwdriver drill operates on a powerful cordless battery system. It features multiple clutch settings, allowing you to adjust the torque output based on the material being worked with. The built-in LED light illuminates your work area for enhanced visibility in dimly lit environments.

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers more power with less energy consumption compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Improved Control and Precision: Multiple clutch settings allow you to customize torque output for different applications, preventing damage to materials.
  • Enhanced Durability: Constructed from high-quality materials, this tool is built to withstand demanding use and provide lasting performance.

Usage

This impact screwdriver drill is versatile enough for a wide range of tasks:

  • Driving screws into various materials, such as wood, metal, and plastic.

  • Tightening and loosening nuts and bolts.
  • Light construction projects around the home or workshop.

The Makita DTW285 Brushless Electric Wrench is a powerful and versatile cordless impact tool designed for heavy-duty fastening applications. This wrench features a brushless motor for increased power and efficiency, allowing you to tackle demanding tasks with ease.

titre: üèÜMakita DDF487 13mm red and black brushless household 18V lithium-ion charging impact drill, high torque electric screwdriver
description:
Features

The Makita DDF487 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact drill designed for demanding household projects. This robust tool boasts a compact design and exceptional performance, making it an ideal choice for tackling a wide range of tasks.

  • Brushless motor: Delivers high power output and efficient operation for enhanced drilling and driving performance.
  • 13mm chuck capacity: Accommodates various drill bits and screwdriver attachments for versatile use.
  • Variable speed control: Allows you to adjust the rotational speed according to the task at hand, ensuring precise and controlled operation.
  • Forward/Reverse switch: Provides flexibility for both driving screws and drilling into different materials.
  • LED light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dimly lit spaces.

Specifications

This impact drill is powered by an 18V lithium-ion battery pack, offering long runtime and quick charging capabilities. Its compact size and ergonomic design contribute to comfortable handling and reduced fatigue during extended use.

Benefits

The Makita DDF487 offers numerous benefits that make it a valuable addition to any household toolkit:

  • High torque output: Enables efficient drilling into tough materials and driving large screws with ease.
  • Cordless operation provides freedom of movement and eliminates the hassle of cords.
  • Brushless motor technology ensures long lifespan and reduced maintenance requirements.
  • Lightweight and compact design enhances maneuverability and user comfort.

Usage

The Makita DDF487 is suitable for a wide range of household applications, including:

  • Drilling holes in wood, metal, and plastic.
  • Driving screws into various materials.
  • Assembling furniture and home fixtures.
  • General DIY tasks around the house.

This powerful and versatile impact drill will become an essential tool for completing your next project with ease and efficiency.

description:

This angle grinder offers numerous benefits, making it an invaluable tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Increased Power: The brushless motor delivers exceptional power for efficient material removal and cutting.
  • Enhanced Efficiency: Brushless technology reduces energy consumption and extends battery runtime.
  • Improved Durability: Constructed with high-quality materials, this grinder is built to withstand demanding workloads.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 Angle Grinder is ideal for a wide range of applications including:

  • Grinding and Cutting Metal: Ideal for shaping, smoothing, and cutting various metals.
  • Removing Rust and Paint: Effective for preparing surfaces for painting or coating.
  • Concrete Cutting and Shaping: Suitable for light concrete work and shaping tasks.

Always ensure you are using the correct grinding discs for your specific application and follow all safety precautions when operating power tools.

titre: üèÜMakita Brushless impact screwdriver DHP487 Drill 40N.m Electric Screwdriver Two Gear Speed Wireless Power Driver Battery Tools
description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 is a cordless impact screwdriver built for power and precision in your projects. With its brushless motor, this tool delivers impressive torque while remaining remarkably compact and lightweight.

  • Brushless Motor: Enjoy extended runtime and increased power compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Two Gear Speeds:
    • Choose the optimal speed setting for various applications, from driving screws in tight spaces to tackling demanding fastening tasks.
  • Ergonomic Design
    • : Comfortable grip and optimized weight distribution ensure fatigue-free operation even during extended use.
  • LED Light
    • : Bright illumination illuminates your work area for enhanced visibility in dimly lit environments.

Specifications

This Makita impact screwdriver is engineered with high-performance components to deliver exceptional results.

  • Torque: 40N.m
  • Battery Type: Lithium-Ion
  • Voltage: 18V

Benefits

The Makita DHP487 impact screwdriver offers numerous advantages for DIY enthusiasts and professionals alike:

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers powerful torque, allowing you to drive screws with ease and tackle tough projects.
  • Versatility
    • : With two gear speeds, this tool is suitable for a wide range of applications, from delicate assembly work to demanding fastening tasks.
  • Reduced Fatigue
    • : The ergonomic design and lightweight construction minimize user fatigue, enabling comfortable operation for extended periods.
  • Enhanced Visibility
    • : The built-in LED light provides ample illumination, ensuring clear visibility in even dimly lit workspaces.

Usage

The Makita DHP487 is incredibly user-friendly. Simply insert the desired bit into the chuck, select the appropriate gear speed, and engage the trigger to start driving. The impact mechanism delivers precise and efficient fastening results.

This versatile tool is ideal for a variety of tasks, including:

  • Assembling furniture
  • Hanging pictures and shelves
  • Driving screws in various materials such as wood, metal, and plastic
  • Tightening bolts and nuts

titre: üèÜMakita DGA404 18V 125/100mm Brushless Lithium Electric Angle Grinder Rechargeable Cutting Machine High Power Polishing Machine
description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile cordless angle grinder designed for demanding cutting, grinding, and polishing tasks. Equipped with a brushless motor, it delivers exceptional performance and durability.

  • Brushless Motor: Provides high power output and extended runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • 125mm/100mm Wheel Compatibility: Accepts both 125mm and 100mm grinding discs, offering flexibility for various applications.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the speed based on the material being worked on, ensuring optimal performance.
  • Soft Start Function: Minimizes kickback and provides smooth starts for increased control.
  • Anti-Restart Prevention: Prevents accidental start-up when the power is restored after a power outage.

Specifications

The Makita DGA404 operates on an 18V Lithium-ion battery platform, providing ample power for extended use. Its compact and lightweight design enhances maneuverability in tight spaces.

  • Battery Voltage: 18V
  • Wheel Size: 125mm / 100mm
  • No-Load Speed: Variable speed range for optimal performance
  • Weight: Lightweight design for ease of handling

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 offers numerous advantages for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • High Performance: The brushless motor delivers exceptional power and torque for demanding cutting and grinding tasks.
  • Extended Runtime: Lithium-ion batteries provide a long runtime, reducing downtime on the job.
  • Versatility: Accepts both 125mm and 100mm discs, expanding its range of applications.
  • Enhanced Control: Features like variable speed control and soft start minimize kickback and ensure precise operation.
  • Durability: Built with high-quality materials for long-lasting performance.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Cutting metal, stone, and concrete.
  • Grinding welds and removing rust.
  • Polishing surfaces for a smooth finish.
  • Various construction, renovation, and maintenance tasks.

titre: Makita DDF487 1600rpm Electric Drill 18V Battery Multifunction Brushless Variable Speed Screwdriver Strong Power Motor Toolsüêâ‚ö°
description:
Features

The Makita DDF487 is a powerful and versatile electric drill designed for a wide range of tasks. Its brushless motor delivers exceptional power and torque, making it ideal for drilling into wood, metal, and plastic.

  • Brushless Motor: The absence of brushes means less friction, increased efficiency, and longer tool life.
  • Variable Speed Control: Adjust the speed to match your drilling or driving needs with a smooth and precise dial.
  • Multiple Clutch Settings: Fine-tune the torque output for different materials and applications, preventing overtightening and damage.
  • Forward/Reverse Switch: Easily switch between drilling and driving modes for added versatility.

Specifications

The Makita DDF487 operates on an 18V battery system and boasts a no-load speed of 1600 RPM. It is lightweight and ergonomically designed for comfortable use, even during extended periods.

Its compact size allows for access to tight spaces.

Benefits

The combination of power, versatility, and user-friendly design makes the Makita DDF487 a valuable addition to any toolbox.

  • High Performance: Tackle demanding drilling and driving tasks with ease thanks to the powerful brushless motor.
  • Improved Efficiency: The brushless motor design reduces energy consumption and prolongs tool life, saving you money in the long run.
  • Increased Control: Variable speed and clutch settings allow for precise control over your projects, preventing damage to materials and tools.
  • Comfortable Operation: Lightweight construction and an ergonomic design minimize fatigue during extended use.

Usage

The Makita DDF487 is suitable for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Drilling into wood, metal, and plastic
  • Driving screws and fasteners
  • General construction tasks

description:
Features

The Makita DTW700 is an electric impact wrench designed for tackling heavy-duty fastening tasks with ease. Powered by a compatible 18V Makita battery, this tool delivers impressive torque and speed, making it ideal for professional use in construction, automotive repair, and industrial settings.

  • High Torque Output: The DTW700 boasts a powerful motor capable of generating an incredible 1000 N.m of torque, enabling you to loosen and tighten even the most stubborn fasteners with minimal effort.
  • 1/2 Inch Drive Size:
    • Accommodates a wide range of sockets and accessories, providing versatility for various applications.
  • Compatible with 18V Makita Batteries:
    • Utilizes standard Makita 18V batteries, ensuring easy power source compatibility and maximizing your existing tool investment.

Specifications

The DTW700 impact wrench is a robust and reliable tool built to withstand demanding applications. Its specifications highlight its durability and performance capabilities.

  • Torque Output: 1000 N.m
  • Drive Size: 1/2 Inch
  • Voltage Compatibility: 18V Makita Batteries
  • Weight: Relatively Lightweight for Enhanced Maneuverability

Benefits

Investing in the Makita DTW700 electric impact wrench offers several tangible benefits that enhance your work efficiency and productivity.

  • Increased Efficiency: The high torque output significantly reduces the time required to loosen and tighten fasteners, speeding up your workflow.
  • Reduced Physical Strain:
    • The powerful motor handles heavy-duty tasks, minimizing the physical effort needed from the user.
  • Versatility:
    • The 1/2 Inch drive size allows for a wide range of socket and accessory compatibility, making it suitable for diverse applications.

Usage

The Makita DTW700 is designed for professional use in various settings. Its robust construction and powerful performance make it an ideal tool for tasks such as:

  • Construction:
    • Tightening bolts on steel beams, assembling structures, and securing heavy equipment.
  • Automotive Repair:
    • Removing lug nuts, tightening engine components, and working on exhaust systems.
  • Industrial Maintenance:
    • Assembling machinery, repairing equipment, and performing routine maintenance tasks.

titre: ‚úÖMakita DDF487 1600rpm Electric Drill 18V Battery Multifunction Brushless Variable Speed Screwdriver Strong Power Motor Toolsüîã
description:
Features

The Makita DDF487 is a powerful and versatile electric drill designed for both drilling and driving tasks. With its brushless motor, variable speed control, and multiple settings, it offers precise control and efficiency across a range of applications.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers exceptional power and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows for precise adjustments based on the material and task at hand, from delicate screwing to robust drilling.
  • Multiple Clutch Settings: Enables you to select the appropriate torque level for different screw sizes and materials, preventing over-tightening or damage.
  • LED Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in tight spaces or dimly lit areas.

Specifications

Powered by an 18V battery, this drill boasts a high operating speed of 1600 RPM and is ergonomically designed for comfortable handling during extended use.

Benefits

The Makita DDF487 offers several key benefits:

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers more power with less energy consumption, extending runtime and improving performance.
  • Enhanced Control: Variable speed control and multiple clutch settings allow for precise adjustments, ensuring accuracy and preventing damage to materials.
  • Improved Visibility: The integrated LED light illuminates the work area for greater clarity and reduced eye strain.

Usage

This versatile drill is suitable for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Drilling into wood, metal, and plastic.
  • Driving screws of various sizes.
  • Home improvement projects.
  • DIY tasks around the house or workshop.

With its robust construction and reliable performance, the Makita DDF487 is a valuable tool for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.

The Makita DTW285 is a powerful and versatile cordless electric wrench designed for demanding applications. This brushless motor tool offers exceptional torque, making it ideal for tightening and loosening even the most stubborn fasteners.

The Makita DTW285 is a versatile tool suitable for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. It finds application in various industries, including construction, automotive repair, and maintenance work.

description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 is a versatile cordless impact drill/driver that combines power, speed, and precision in one compact design. It's perfect for tackling a wide range of drilling and driving tasks around the house, workshop, or job site.

  • Powerful Motor: Delivers high torque for driving large screws and bolts with ease.
  • Impact Driving Mechanism: Provides extra power for drilling into tough materials like concrete and steel.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the speed according to the task at hand, ensuring precision control.
  • Forward/Reverse Switch: Makes it easy to switch between driving and removing screws.
  • LED Worklight: Illuminates your work area for improved visibility in dark spaces.

Specifications

The Makita DHP487 features a robust lithium-ion battery that provides long runtime and exceptional performance. Its compact size and ergonomic design make it comfortable to use for extended periods.

Battery: Lithium-ion, providing high power and run time.

Voltage: 18V (This specification might vary depending on the specific model or kit).

Chuck Size: This allows you to easily change drill bits for various tasks.

Benefits

The Makita DHP487 offers a range of benefits that make it a valuable tool for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.

  • Increased Efficiency: Cordless freedom lets you move around your workspace without restrictions, saving time and effort.
  • Enhanced Power: The powerful motor delivers the torque needed to tackle demanding drilling and driving tasks.
  • Improved Control: Variable speed control and an ergonomic design provide precise control for a wide range of applications.

Usage

The Makita DHP487 is ideal for various tasks, including:

  • Drilling holes in wood, metal, and plastic.
  • Driving screws and bolts of different sizes.
  • Assembling furniture and home fixtures.
  • Light demolition work.

description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact screwdriver drill designed for demanding tasks. This brushless motor tool boasts an ergonomic design for comfortable use, even during extended projects.

  • Brushless Motor: Provides increased power and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors
  • Powerful Impact Mechanism: Delivers high torque output for driving screws and drilling into various materials
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the speed according to the task at hand, ensuring precise control
  • Built-in LED Work Light: Illuminates your work area for improved visibility in dark or confined spaces
  • Compact and Lightweight Design: Offers maneuverability and reduced fatigue during prolonged use
  • Forward/Reverse Switch: Enables both driving and removing screws with ease

Specifications

This powerful tool is compatible with Makita's 18V Lithium-Ion battery system.

Benefits

The Makita DHP487 offers numerous benefits for both professional and DIY users:

  • Increased Productivity: The powerful motor and impact mechanism allow you to complete tasks quickly and efficiently
  • Enhanced Control: Variable speed control and the forward/reverse switch provide precise operation
  • Improved Visibility: The built-in LED work light illuminates your work area for clearer sight
  • Extended Runtime: Makita's 18V Lithium-Ion batteries offer long runtimes, minimizing downtime between charges
  • Versatility: Capable of driving screws and drilling into a variety of materials

Usage

The Makita DHP487 is ideal for a wide range of applications:

  • Home Improvement Projects: Driving screws, assembling furniture, installing fixtures
  • DIY Repairs and Maintenance: Tightening bolts, removing old screws, drilling pilot holes
  • Construction and Remodeling: Driving deck screws, installing drywall, working with various building materials

titre: Original Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver 180N.m Cordless Electric Drill Screwdriver Power Tool For Makita 18V Battery
description:
Features

The Original Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver is a powerful and versatile tool designed for demanding drilling and driving tasks. Its brushless motor delivers exceptional torque and speed, making it ideal for a wide range of applications.

  • Brushless Motor: Provides increased power, efficiency, and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • High Torque Output: Delivers up to 180N.m of torque, allowing you to drive large screws and fasteners with ease.
  • Variable Speed Control: Offers precise control over drilling and driving speed for different materials and applications.
  • Forward/Reverse Switch: Enables both clockwise and counterclockwise rotation for driving and removing fasteners.
  • Ergonomic Design: Features a comfortable grip and lightweight construction for reduced user fatigue.

Specifications

The DTD173 Impact Driver is compatible with Makita 18V batteries, offering a wide range of runtime options. Its compact design allows for maneuverability in tight spaces.

  • Voltage: 18V
  • Torque Output: Up to 180N.m
  • Battery Compatibility: Makita 18V batteries (sold separately)
  • Chuck Size: Standard drill chuck size for versatility in bit selection.

Benefits

The Original Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver offers numerous benefits that make it a valuable addition to any toolbox. Its powerful motor and high torque output allow you to complete demanding tasks with ease, while its variable speed control provides precise control over your work.

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers more power and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Enhanced Control and Accuracy: Variable speed control allows for precise adjustments based on the material and task.
  • Reduced User Fatigue: The ergonomic design and lightweight construction minimize strain during extended use.

Usage

The DTD173 Impact Driver is suitable for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Driving screws and fasteners of various sizes.
  • Drilling into wood, metal, and concrete (with appropriate drill bits).
  • Assembly and disassembly tasks in construction, home improvement, and automotive repair.

Always wear appropriate safety gear, including eye protection and gloves, when operating this tool.

titre: ‚úÖMakita Original DDF487 Cordless Driver Drill Brushless Electric Impact Screwdriver Rechargeable Power Tool 18Vüîã
description:
Features

The Makita DDF487 is a powerful and versatile cordless driver drill designed for demanding applications. It boasts a brushless motor, offering increased efficiency, runtime, and durability compared to traditional brushed motors.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers exceptional power and torque for tackling tough drilling and driving tasks.
  • Cordless Operation: Provides ultimate freedom of movement and portability on the job site.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the drill speed according to your specific needs, from delicate screw driving to high-impact drilling.
  • LED Work Light: Illuminates your work area for improved visibility in dark or confined spaces.
  • Compact and Ergonomic Design: Ensures comfortable handling and maneuverability even during prolonged use.

Specifications

The Makita DDF487 is powered by an 18V lithium-ion battery, providing a long runtime for extended work sessions. The tool features a robust chuck that securely holds drill bits and screwdriver attachments.

Benefits

By combining a brushless motor with cordless convenience, the Makita DDF487 offers numerous benefits:

  • Increased Power: The brushless motor delivers exceptional torque for demanding drilling and driving applications.
  • Enhanced Runtime: Lithium-ion batteries provide long runtimes, minimizing downtime and maximizing productivity.
  • Durability: Brushless motors are more durable and require less maintenance than traditional brushed motors.
  • Versatility: With variable speed control and a wide range of compatible bits and attachments, the DDF487 can handle various tasks around the home or workshop.

Usage

The Makita DDF487 is ideal for a variety of applications, including:

  • Drilling holes in wood, metal, and plastic
  • Driving screws into various materials
  • Assembling furniture and other projects
  • Home improvement and DIY tasks
  • Light-duty construction work

description:
Features

The Makita DTW285 boasts a powerful brushless motor that delivers exceptional torque and performance, making it ideal for demanding fastening tasks. Its compact design allows for easy maneuverability in tight spaces, while the ergonomic grip ensures comfortable operation even during extended use.

  • Voltage: 18V

Benefits

By utilizing a brushless motor, the DTW285 provides increased efficiency and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors. The powerful torque output allows for effortless drilling into tough materials and driving large fasteners.

The compact design reduces fatigue during prolonged use, making it ideal for professionals who spend extended periods working in various positions. Its compatibility with Makita 18V batteries offers a convenient and versatile power solution.

Usage

The Makita DTW285 is designed for heavy-duty fastening applications such as driving screws, bolts, and nuts in construction, maintenance, and industrial settings. It's suitable for professionals seeking a reliable and efficient tool to handle demanding tasks.

description:
Features

The Makita DTW700 Brushless Impact Wrench is a powerful and compact tool designed for demanding applications. With its brushless motor technology, it delivers exceptional torque of up to 1000 Nm, enabling you to tackle even the toughest fastening tasks with ease.

  • Brushless Motor Technology: Provides increased power, runtime, and durability compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Variable Speed Control:** Allows you to adjust the speed according to the application for precise control.
  • LED Worklight
  • Forward/Reverse Switch
  • Rubberized Grip: Provides enhanced comfort and control during extended use.

Specifications

This impact wrench is designed to operate with Makita 18V Lithium-Ion batteries. Its compact design allows for maneuverability in tight spaces, while its robust construction ensures long-lasting performance.

  • Voltage: 18V
  • Torque: Up to 1000 Nm
  • Anvil Size: 1/2 inch Square Drive
  • Battery Type: Makita 18V Lithium-Ion (sold separately)

Benefits

The DTW700 offers a range of benefits for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Increased Power and Performance:** The brushless motor delivers exceptional torque, enabling you to drive large fasteners and tackle demanding projects with ease.
  • Enhanced Durability: The robust construction and use of high-quality materials ensure long-lasting performance even in demanding conditions.
  • Improved Runtime: Brushless motor technology reduces energy consumption, providing extended runtime per battery charge.

Usage

This impact wrench is ideal for a wide variety of applications:

  • Tightening and loosening lug nuts on vehicles
  • Assembling heavy-duty furniture or equipment
  • Working with large fasteners in construction projects
  • Various other industrial and automotive applications

The DTW700 is a versatile and powerful tool that will become an indispensable asset in your workshop or toolbox.

description:
Features

The Makita DTD173 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact driver designed for demanding tasks in various applications. This tool boasts an LXT brushless motor, providing exceptional power and efficiency.

  • Brushless Motor Technology: Delivers increased power, runtime, and efficiency compared to brushed motors.
  • Variable Speed Trigger: Allows for precise control over torque output.
  • Forward/Reverse Switch: Enables both driving and drilling functions.
  • T-Mode Setting: Provides a specialized setting for driving screws with minimal rotation, preventing cam-out.
  • Ergonomic Design: Features a comfortable grip for extended use.

Specifications

The Makita DTD173 is compatible with Makita's 18V LXT lithium-ion batteries (sold separately) and operates at a voltage of 18V. It delivers an impressive torque output of 180 Nm.

Benefits

This impact driver offers several advantages for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Increased Power: The brushless motor provides ample power to tackle even the most challenging fasteners.
  • Improved Runtime: LXT batteries deliver extended runtime, reducing downtime on the job.
  • Versatility: With forward/reverse functionality and a T-Mode setting, this tool can handle a wide range of tasks.
  • Controllability: The variable speed trigger allows for precise torque adjustment.

Usage

The Makita DTD173 is ideal for various applications, including:

  • Driving screws and bolts in wood, metal, and concrete.
  • Assembling furniture and other DIY projects.
  • Construction and renovation tasks.

description:
Features

The Makita DTW700 Brushless Electric Wrench is a powerful tool designed to tackle demanding fastening applications. Featuring a robust brushless motor and high torque output, it provides exceptional performance for driving large fasteners and tightening stubborn bolts.

  • Brushless Motor: Offers increased power, efficiency, and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • High Torque Output: Delivers ample twisting force to handle heavy-duty fastening tasks.
  • Reversible Operation: Allows for both driving and loosening of fasteners with ease.
  • Ergonomic Design: Features a comfortable grip and well-balanced construction for extended use.

Specifications

The Makita DTW700 is powered by an 18V lithium-ion battery, providing ample power for demanding applications. Its compact design allows for maneuverability in tight spaces.

  • Voltage: 18V
  • Battery Type: Lithium-ion Rechargeable
  • Compact Size: Designed for easy handling and access in confined areas.

Benefits

The Makita DTW700 Brushless Electric Wrench offers several key benefits:

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers superior performance, enhancing productivity on the job site.
  • Reduced Wear and Tear: Brushless motors operate with less friction, resulting in longer tool life and reduced maintenance.
  • Enhanced Control: The high torque output provides precise control for various fastening applications.

Usage

The Makita DTW700 is suitable for a wide range of professional and DIY tasks, including:

  • Driving large screws and bolts.
  • Tightening nuts and fasteners in automotive, construction, or home improvement projects.
  • Assembling heavy-duty equipment or furniture.

This impact driver is an essential tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. It's ideal for a variety of applications, including:

titre: 100% Original Makita 18V DTD173 Cordless Screwdriver Electric Key Wrench Torque Toos Impact Gun Power Tools Wireless Drill
description:
Features

The Makita 18V DTD173 Cordless Screwdriver is a powerful and versatile tool designed for professional use. This impact gun combines the torque of a screwdriver with the speed of an impact wrench, making it ideal for driving screws and nuts in a variety of materials.

  • Powerful motor: Delivers high torque output for demanding fastening tasks.
  • Compact and lightweight design: Provides excellent maneuverability and user comfort.
  • Variable speed trigger: Allows for precise control over rotation speed.
  • Forward/reverse switch: Enables both driving and loosening of fasteners.
  • Integrated LED light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility.

Specifications

This cordless screwdriver is powered by an 18V Makita lithium-ion battery (sold separately). The DTD173 features a brushless motor, ensuring high performance and long tool life. It operates at variable speeds up to a high RPM for versatile applications.

Benefits

The Makita DTD173 Cordless Screwdriver offers numerous benefits for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Increased efficiency: Quickly and easily drive screws and nuts with the powerful impact mechanism.
  • Enhanced control: The variable speed trigger and forward/reverse switch provide precise fastening.
  • Cordless convenience: Work wirelessly for greater mobility and flexibility in tight spaces.
  • Durability and reliability: Built to withstand tough jobsite conditions with Makita's renowned quality.

Usage

This versatile tool is suitable for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Construction and remodeling projects.
  • Automotive repair and maintenance.
  • Furniture assembly and repair.
  • General household tasks.

Always wear appropriate safety gear, such as eye protection and work gloves, when using power tools. Read the instruction manual carefully before operating the Makita DTD173 Cordless Screwdriver.

titre: üèÜü•á100% Origina Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver Rechargeable Screwdriver Drills Cordless Power Tools 18V BL Motor Tools
description:
Features

The Makita DTD173 brushless impact driver is a powerful and versatile tool designed for demanding drilling and driving applications. It features a robust brushless motor, providing superior performance and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers enhanced power, runtime, and durability.
  • Impact Driver Function: Provides high torque for driving large fasteners with ease.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows for precise speed adjustment based on the task at hand.
  • LED Work Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dark spaces.
  • Compact and Lightweight Design: Ensures comfortable handling and maneuverability.

Specifications

Powered by an 18V lithium-ion battery (sold separately), this impact driver offers a high level of cordless freedom. Its motor is electronically controlled for smooth operation and precise torque delivery. The tool is compatible with Makita's extensive range of accessories, expanding its versatility for various projects.

  • Voltage: 18V
  • Battery Type: Lithium-ion (sold separately)
  • Motor Type: Brushless

Benefits

The Makita DTD173 offers a range of benefits for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Its powerful motor, impact driver functionality, and variable speed control make it ideal for tackling demanding tasks. The compact design and ergonomic features ensure comfortable use, while the LED work light enhances visibility.

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers superior performance compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Enhanced Durability: Designed with high-quality materials for long-lasting performance.
  • Precise Control: Variable speed control allows for accurate adjustments based on the task.
  • Improved Visibility: The integrated LED work light illuminates the work area for clear visibility.

Usage

This impact driver is versatile and suitable for a variety of applications, including driving screws, bolts, and lag screws; drilling into wood, metal, and concrete; and assembling furniture, decks, and other structures. It's ideal for use in both home workshops and professional construction sites.

description:
Features

The Makita DTD173 Brushless Electric Screwdriver is a powerful and versatile tool designed for demanding auto repair applications. It boasts a robust brushless motor, delivering exceptional torque and speed control for tackling tough fasteners.

  • Brushless Motor: Provides superior power and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors.

  • Variable Speed Control: Offers precise speed adjustment for optimal performance in various applications.
  • Compact and Lightweight Design: Ensures comfortable handling and ease of maneuverability in tight spaces.

Specifications

This powerful screwdriver is built to withstand the rigors of professional use. Its specifications reflect its durability and reliability:

  • Voltage: 18V (requires a compatible Makita battery)
  • Torque: 220 N.m (adjustable)
  • No-load Speed: High speed range for efficient driving
  • Clutch Settings: Multiple settings to prevent overtightening and damage to fasteners

Benefits

The Makita DTD173 offers numerous benefits that make it a valuable asset for auto repair professionals:

  • Increased Productivity: Powerful motor and high torque output enable faster work completion.
  • Enhanced Accuracy: Precise speed control and clutch settings ensure accurate fastening.
  • Reduced Fatigue: Compact and lightweight design minimizes user fatigue during extended use.

Usage

This versatile screwdriver is ideal for a wide range of auto repair tasks:

  • Tightening and loosening lug nuts, bolts, and other fasteners.
  • Assembling and disassembling components.
  • Working in confined spaces due to its compact size.

titre: NEW Makita DTD173 1800RPM Cordless Impact Driver 180N.m Brushless Motor Electric Drill Wood/Bolt/T-Mode For Makita Battery Pins
description:
Makita DTD173 Cordless Impact Driver

The Makita DTD173 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact driver, designed to tackle demanding drilling and driving tasks with ease. Powered by a brushless motor, this tool delivers impressive torque and speed, making it ideal for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.

Features

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers high power and runtime efficiency for extended use
  • Variable Speed Control with Reverse: Allows for precise control over drilling and driving speed, with a reverse function for easy removal of fasteners
  • T-Mode Functionality: Provides torque adjustment options for different materials and applications
  • LED Job Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dimly lit environments
  • Ergonomic Design: Contoured grip and lightweight construction ensure comfortable handling and reduced fatigue during extended use

Specifications

Motor Type: Brushless

No Load Speed: 1800 RPM

Max Torque Output: 180 N.m

Benefits

The Makita DTD173 offers a range of benefits, including:

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers powerful performance while maximizing runtime for extended work sessions.
  • Precise Control and Versatility: Variable speed control with reverse and the T-Mode functionality allow for precise adjustments to tackle a variety of materials and tasks.
  • Improved Visibility and Convenience: The integrated LED job light enhances visibility in dark areas, while the ergonomic design reduces fatigue for comfortable operation.

Usage

The Makita DTD173 is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Driving Screws and Bolts: From small fasteners to large construction screws, this impact driver provides the torque needed for quick and efficient driving.
  • Drilling in Wood and Metal: The powerful motor allows you to drill pilot holes or make full-depth holes in various materials with ease.
  • Driving Studs and Nails: Use the impact driver's specialized settings to effectively drive studs and nails for construction projects.

description:
100% Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver

The Makita DTD173 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact driver built for professionals demanding top-tier performance. This tool seamlessly integrates with the Makita 18V battery system, delivering exceptional torque and speed to tackle even the toughest drilling and fastening applications.

Features

  • Brushless motor technology: Offers increased power output and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • 180 Nm of max torque: Provides ample power for driving large fasteners into various materials.
  • Variable speed control: Allows you to adjust the speed based on the task at hand, ensuring precise control and accuracy.
  • Compact and lightweight design: Enhances maneuverability in tight spaces and reduces operator fatigue during prolonged use.
  • Forward/reverse switch: Enables easy switching between driving and loosening operations.

Specifications

Battery System: Makita 18V LXT Lithium-Ion (sold separately)

Torque: 180 Nm (Max)

Impact Rate: Impacts per minute (imp/min) - Specifications will vary based on battery used.

Chuck Size: Standard hex chuck size for bit compatibility.

Benefits

  • Increased Productivity: The powerful motor and high torque output allow for faster driving times, saving you valuable time on the job site.
  • Enhanced Accuracy: Variable speed control provides precise control over fastener insertion, minimizing stripped screws or damaged materials.
  • Greater Comfort: The compact and lightweight design reduces fatigue and allows for easier handling, even during extended use.

Usage

This impact driver is ideal for a wide range of professional applications, including:

  • Driving large fasteners (screws, bolts) in various materials like wood, metal, and concrete.
  • Demolition tasks involving loosening or removing stubborn fasteners.
  • Construction projects requiring precise fastening and high torque output.

The Makita DTW700 is a powerful cordless impact wrench designed for demanding fastening applications. Equipped with a brushless motor, it delivers exceptional torque and runtime. This tool is ideal for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who need to tackle heavy-duty tasks.

  • Variable Speed Control: A variable speed trigger allows for precise control over the output speed, enabling you to adjust the torque according to the application.
  • 1/2-Inch Drive Size: The 1/2-inch drive size accommodates a wide range of sockets and accessories, making it versatile for various tasks.
  • Forward/Reverse Switch: Easily switch between forward and reverse rotation for driving or removing fasteners.

Specifications

This impact wrench operates on Makita 18V lithium-ion batteries (sold separately). The tool features a durable construction with a comfortable ergonomic grip for extended use.

Benefits

The Makita DTW700 offers several benefits for users:

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers exceptional torque output and runtime, enhancing productivity.
  • Enhanced Durability: Its robust construction ensures long-lasting performance even under heavy workloads.
  • Precise Control: The variable speed trigger allows for customized adjustments based on the application.
  • Versatility: The 1/2-inch drive size and wide range of compatible accessories make it suitable for diverse fastening tasks.

Usage

The Makita DTW700 is ideal for a variety of applications, including:

  • Automotive Repair and Maintenance
  • Construction and Remodeling
  • Industrial Applications
  • Home Improvement Projects

Always follow the manufacturer's instructions and safety guidelines when using this tool.

The LED indicator provides valuable insight into your battery's status, allowing for informed decision-making regarding when to recharge.

Usage

This Makita 18V 6.0 Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery is compatible with a wide range of Makita cordless power tools designed for various applications, including drilling, driving, cutting, and more.

Always refer to your specific tool's manual for compatibility information and recommended usage guidelines.

titre: üèÜMakita DGA404 100/125mm Brushless Angle Grinder Variable Adjustment Cordless Grinding Cutting Woodworking Tool For 18V Battery
description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile cordless angle grinder designed for demanding grinding, cutting, and polishing tasks. This brushless motor-driven tool delivers exceptional performance and durability.

  • Brushless Motor: Experience longer runtime and increased efficiency with the latest brushless motor technology.
  • Variable Speed Adjustment: Fine-tune your grinding speed for optimal results on different materials and applications.
  • Durable Construction: Built to withstand heavy-duty use, this angle grinder features robust construction for lasting performance.

Specifications

This Makita angle grinder boasts a 100/125mm disc size, suitable for a wide range of grinding and cutting applications. The tool is designed to operate with Makita's 18V batteries, offering ample power and run time.

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 provides numerous advantages for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Increased Productivity: The brushless motor and variable speed control allow you to complete tasks efficiently and quickly.
  • Enhanced Control: Precise speed adjustment ensures optimal performance on various materials, minimizing the risk of damage.
  • Cordless Convenience: Enjoy the freedom of movement and flexibility that comes with cordless operation.

Usage

This versatile angle grinder is ideal for a variety of applications:

  • Grinding metal, stone, wood, and other materials
  • Cutting through pipes, rods, and various materials
  • Polishing surfaces for a smooth finish

Always wear appropriate safety gear, including eye protection, gloves, and ear protection, when using this tool. Refer to the user manual for detailed instructions and safety precautions.

description:
Features

The Makita DDF487 cordless driver drill is a powerful and versatile tool designed to tackle a wide range of drilling and driving tasks. Equipped with brushless motor technology, this impact screwdriver delivers exceptional torque and runtime.

  • Brushless Motor: Provides increased power and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Variable Speed Trigger: Allows for precise control over drilling and driving speed.
  • Forward/Reverse Switch: Easily switch between directions for driving screws or removing fasteners.
  • Compact and Lightweight Design: Ensures comfortable handling and maneuverability.
  • LED Job Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dimly lit spaces.

Specifications

The DDF487 operates on an 18V lithium-ion battery platform, offering a long runtime and reliable performance. The tool features a high torque output, capable of driving large screws and bolts with ease.

  • Voltage: 18V
  • Battery Type: Lithium-Ion
  • Torque Output: High Torque
  • Chuck Size: Standard Drill Chuck
  • Weight: Moderately Lightweight

Benefits

Investing in the Makita DDF487 provides several advantages for DIY enthusiasts and professionals alike:

  • Increased Power & Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers exceptional power and runtime, allowing you to complete tasks more efficiently.
  • Versatility: Suitable for a wide range of drilling, driving, and fastening applications.
  • Enhanced Control: Variable speed trigger and forward/reverse switch provide precise control over the tool's operation.
  • Ergonomic Design: The compact and lightweight design minimizes user fatigue during extended use.

Usage

The Makita DDF487 is an ideal tool for various projects, including:

  • Drilling holes in wood, metal, and plastic.
  • Driving screws of different sizes and materials.
  • Assembling furniture and other DIY projects.
  • Home repairs and maintenance tasks.

For optimal performance, always use the recommended Makita 18V lithium-ion batteries and follow the manufacturer's instructions carefully.

titre: Makita DHP487 18V LXT Brushless Cordless Impact Drill Motor Compact Hammer Driver Rechargeable Screwdriver Power Tools DHP487Z?
description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact drill driver designed for demanding applications. It boasts a brushless motor for increased efficiency and runtime, along with an ergonomic design for user comfort.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers high torque output and extended runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Compact Design: Provides exceptional maneuverability in tight spaces and reduces fatigue during extended use.
  • Variable Speed Trigger: Allows for precise control over drilling and driving speed, suitable for a variety of materials.
  • Hammer Function: Enables drilling into concrete and masonry with ease.
  • LED Job Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dimly lit environments.

Specifications

The Makita DHP487 is built to withstand rigorous use with durable construction and quality components. Its compact size and lightweight design make it easy to handle.

Benefits

Experience the benefits of cordless power with the Makita DHP487. The brushless motor provides longer runtime, allowing you to work efficiently without frequent recharging. Its compact size enhances maneuverability in tight spaces, while the hammer function expands its capabilities for drilling into various materials.

The variable speed trigger and LED job light further contribute to a user-friendly experience, ensuring precise control and improved visibility.

Usage

This versatile impact drill driver is ideal for a wide range of applications. Use it for driving screws, drilling holes in wood, metal, and plastic, as well as hammering into concrete and masonry. The Makita DHP487 is a valuable tool for both professional contractors and DIY enthusiasts.

Remember to always wear appropriate safety gear, including eye protection and hearing protection when operating power tools.

titre: ‚úÖMakita DHP487 Cordless Impact Drill Electric Screwdriver Electric Hammer Drill Wireless Drill Lithium-Ion Battery Power Toolsüîã
description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 is a versatile cordless impact drill that combines the power of an electric hammer drill with the convenience of wireless operation. This tool is packed with features to tackle a wide range of drilling and driving tasks.

  • Cordless Operation: Enjoy freedom of movement and eliminate the hassle of cords, making it perfect for working in tight spaces or on large projects.
  • Impact Driving: Deliver powerful torque for quickly driving screws and fasteners into tough materials.
  • Hammer Drill Functionality: Drill through masonry and concrete with ease thanks to the built-in hammer function.
  • Variable Speed Control: Adjust the drilling speed according to the material and task for optimal performance.
  • LED Job Light: Illuminate your work area for improved visibility in dimly lit spaces.

Specifications

The Makita DHP487 is powered by a high-capacity lithium-ion battery, delivering long runtime and consistent power throughout its use. The compact design makes it comfortable to handle during extended periods of operation.

Benefits

This powerful and versatile tool offers numerous benefits for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts:

  • Increased Productivity: Complete tasks faster with the high torque and variable speed control.
  • Improved Versatility: Tackle a wide range of projects, from drilling into wood to driving screws in metal and even drilling through masonry.
  • Enhanced Comfort: The lightweight and ergonomic design reduces user fatigue during extended use.

Usage

The Makita DHP487 is suitable for a variety of applications, including:

  • Drilling holes in wood, metal, and concrete.
  • Driving screws into various materials.
  • Assembling furniture and other DIY projects.

description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 Impact Driver is a versatile power tool designed for both drilling and driving tasks. Its powerful motor delivers impressive torque for tackling tough fastening projects. The impact mechanism provides extra force to drive screws effortlessly, while the two-speed gear settings allow you to adjust the speed according to the application.

  • Built-in LED light illuminates work area

Specifications

This Makita impact driver is built with robust construction and reliable components. Its lithium-ion battery provides a long runtime, ensuring you can complete projects without interruption.

  • Battery: Lithium-Ion
  • Voltage: Suitable for demanding applications
  • Torque Settings: Multiple settings to adjust for different fasteners
  • Chuck Size: Accommodates a variety of drill bits and screwdriver attachments

Benefits

The Makita DHP487 Impact Driver offers numerous benefits that make it an essential tool for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Its powerful motor, impact mechanism, and two-speed settings allow you to tackle a wide range of projects with ease.

  • Increased speed and efficiency compared to manual driving
  • Reduced risk of stripping screws due to precise torque control
  • Versatile tool suitable for various drilling and driving tasks
  • Ergonomic design minimizes fatigue during extended use

Usage

Using the Makita DHP487 Impact Driver is straightforward. Simply select the appropriate speed setting, torque level, and insert the desired drill bit or screwdriver attachment. The built-in LED light provides illumination for improved visibility in dimly lit areas.

Always wear safety glasses and gloves when operating power tools, and follow the manufacturer's instructions carefully for safe and efficient use.

titre: üê≤Makita Electric Wrench DTW700 Brushless Multi functional Rechargeable 18V Auto Repair 1000N.M High Torque Cordless Impact Wren
description:
Features

The Makita DTW700 brushless electric wrench is a powerful and versatile tool designed for demanding automotive repair tasks. It combines high torque output with cordless convenience, making it ideal for professionals who need a reliable solution on the go.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers long runtime and exceptional power efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • High Torque Output: With 1000Nm of maximum torque, this wrench can handle even the toughest fastening jobs with ease.
  • Variable Speed Control: Adjust the speed to match the application for precise control and optimal performance.
  • Forward/Reverse Function: Switch between forward and reverse rotation for both tightening and loosening applications.
  • Compact and Lightweight Design: Designed for improved maneuverability in tight spaces, reducing fatigue during extended use.

Specifications

This powerful impact wrench operates on Makita's 18V lithium-ion battery platform. It features an integrated LED light to illuminate work areas and a belt hook for convenient storage.

Benefits

The Makita DTW700 offers numerous advantages over traditional corded impact wrenches:

  • Cordless Freedom: Work anywhere without being tethered to an outlet, providing increased mobility and flexibility.
  • Enhanced Power Efficiency: The brushless motor significantly reduces power consumption, extending runtime between charges.
  • Increased Durability: Built with high-quality materials for long-lasting performance and resistance to wear and tear.
  • User-Friendly Design: Intuitive controls and ergonomic design ensure comfortable and efficient operation.

Usage

The Makita DTW700 is ideal for a wide range of automotive repair tasks, including:

  • Wheel Lug Nut Tightening/Loosening
  • Engine Component Installation/Removal
  • Suspension Repair and Maintenance
  • Brake System Work
  • Other Heavy-Duty Fastening Applications

Always follow safety precautions when operating power tools. Wear appropriate eye protection and gloves, and secure your workpiece properly.

titre: üèÜü•áNEW Makita DTD173 1800RPM Cordless Impact Driver 180N.m Brushless Motor Electric Drill Wood/Bolt/T-Mode For Makita Battery P
description:
Features

The Makita DTD173 Impact Driver is a powerful and versatile tool designed for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. It boasts an incredibly robust brushless motor, capable of delivering up to 180N.m of torque. This allows you to tackle even the toughest fastening jobs with ease.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers superior power and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors
  • High Torque Output: With 180N.m of torque, it can handle a wide range of heavy-duty applications
  • Variable Speed Control: Adjust the speed according to the task for precise control and optimal results
  • 3 Driving Modes: Choose between Standard, Hammer, and Auto mode for different driving needs
  • LED Work Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dark or confined spaces

Specifications

The Makita DTD173 Impact Driver is engineered for performance and durability. It features:

  • Powerful Brushless Motor
  • High Torque Output of up to 180N.m
  • Variable Speed Control (up to 1800 RPM)
  • Three Driving Modes: Standard, Hammer, and Auto
  • Compact and Lightweight Design

Benefits

The Makita DTD173 Impact Driver offers numerous advantages for users:

  • Increased Productivity: High torque and variable speed control allow you to complete tasks quickly and efficiently.
  • Enhanced Control: Three driving modes provide precise control for different materials and applications.
  • Durable Construction: Built to withstand the demands of heavy-duty use.
  • Improved Visibility: The integrated LED work light illuminates your workspace for enhanced clarity.

Usage

The Makita DTD173 Impact Driver is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Driving screws and bolts in wood, metal, and other materials
  • Assembling furniture and other DIY projects
  • Automotive repair and maintenance
  • Construction and remodeling tasks

With its powerful performance, versatility, and user-friendly design, the Makita DTD173 Impact Driver is an essential tool for any serious do-it-yourselfer or professional contractor.

titre: üèÜü•áMakita DTD173 1800rpm Cordless Impact Driver 180N.m Brushless Motor Electric Drill Wood/Bolt/T-Mode For Makita 18v Battery P
description:
Features

The Makita DTD173 is a powerful cordless impact driver designed for demanding drilling and driving tasks. This tool boasts a robust brushless motor that delivers exceptional torque and runtime, making it perfect for tackling tough jobs in wood, metal, and more.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers powerful performance with increased efficiency and extended run time.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows for precise control over drilling and driving speed to suit different materials and applications.
  • Forward/Reverse Rotation: Provides versatility for both driving screws and loosening fasteners.
  • T-Mode Function: This unique feature offers a specialized mode optimized for driving screws with greater accuracy and less cam-out.
  • LED Work Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dimly lit spaces.

Specifications

The Makita DTD173 is compatible with 18V Makita batteries, offering a wide range of power options.

  • Voltage: 18V (Compatible with Makita 18V batteries)
  • No-Load Speed: 1800 RPM
  • Max Torque: 180 Nm

Benefits

The combination of a brushless motor, variable speed control, and T-Mode function makes the Makita DTD173 an incredibly versatile and efficient impact driver.

Its powerful torque allows you to tackle demanding tasks with ease, while its compact design provides excellent maneuverability in tight spaces.

The LED work light further enhances visibility, allowing you to work confidently even in challenging conditions.

Usage

The Makita DTD173 is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Driving screws and fasteners in wood, metal, and other materials
  • Drilling holes in various materials
  • Removing stubborn bolts and nuts
  • Working on construction projects, home improvement tasks, and DIY repairs

titre: üèÜMakita DGA404 125mm Brushless Cordless Angle Grinder Electric Cutting Machine Polishing Home Handheld Power Tools For Makita 1
description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile cordless angle grinder designed for demanding cutting, grinding, and polishing applications. Its brushless motor delivers high power and efficiency, while its compact design provides excellent maneuverability.

  • Brushless Motor: Ensures longer runtime and increased durability compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • 125mm Disc Size: Accommodates a wide range of grinding and cutting discs for various materials.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the speed according to the application, providing precise control over material removal.
  • Spindle Lock: Simplifies disc changes with a quick and easy locking mechanism.

Specifications

The Makita DGA404 is a 125mm angle grinder powered by Makita's 18V lithium-ion battery platform. Its robust construction and advanced features make it suitable for professional and DIY use.

  • Disc Size: 125mm
  • No Load Speed: High speed range for efficient cutting and grinding
  • Battery Voltage: 18V
  • Weight: Lightweight design for comfortable handling

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 offers numerous benefits over traditional angle grinders, including:

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers more power with less energy consumption, extending runtime and reducing fatigue.
  • Enhanced Durability: The robust construction ensures long-lasting performance even in demanding applications.
  • Greater Control and Precision: Variable speed control allows for fine adjustments, while the spindle lock facilitates quick and easy disc changes.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 is a versatile tool suitable for a wide range of applications:

  • Cutting metal, stone, and concrete.
  • Grinding welds and removing rust.
  • Polishing surfaces for a smooth finish.

Its compact size and lightweight design make it ideal for both professional contractors and DIY enthusiasts.

description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 is a powerhouse impact screwdriver drill, designed for professional use and tackling demanding projects. It's equipped with a powerful brushless motor that delivers exceptional torque and speed control.

  • Brushless Motor Technology: This innovative technology provides more power and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Two-Speed Gear Settings: Select the appropriate speed for different applications, from precision screw driving to heavy-duty drilling.
  • Compact and Ergonomic Design: The DHP487 is designed for comfort and control, even during extended use.
  • LED Work Light: illuminates your work area for enhanced visibility in dimly lit spaces.

Specifications

The Makita DHP487 boasts impressive specifications that make it a reliable tool for professionals:

  • Voltage: 18V (requires compatible Makita battery)
  • Torque Output: 40N.m
  • Chuck Size: Standard size to accommodate various drill bits and screwdriver attachments.

Benefits

The combination of power, precision, and ergonomics make the Makita DHP487 a highly beneficial tool:

  • Increased Productivity: The high torque output and two-speed settings allow you to complete tasks quickly and efficiently.
  • Enhanced Accuracy: The adjustable speed control provides precise control for delicate screw driving applications.
  • Reduced Fatigue: The compact design and comfortable grip minimize hand and wrist strain during prolonged use.

Usage

The Makita DHP487 is versatile and suitable for a wide range of applications:

  • Driving screws into various materials, including wood, metal, and plastic.
  • Drilling holes in wood, drywall, and other common building materials.
  • Perfect for DIY projects, home repairs, and professional construction work.

titre: üèÜü•áMakita DGA404 18V 125mm brushless lithium battery with multiple electric grinders, angle grinders, rechargeable cutting Mach
description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 18V 125mm Brushless Lithium Battery Grinder is a powerful and versatile tool designed for demanding cutting and grinding applications. It boasts a range of features that enhance performance, durability, and user comfort.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers high power output with improved efficiency and longer run time compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the grinding speed based on the material and application for optimal results.
  • Electric Brake: Provides quick stopping power for increased safety and control during operation.
  • Ergonomic Design: Features a comfortable grip and well-balanced construction for reduced user fatigue during prolonged use.

Specifications

The Makita DGA404 operates on an 18V lithium-ion battery system. The grinder has a robust 125mm disc size, making it suitable for various cutting and grinding tasks. Its compact design allows for easy maneuverability in tight spaces.

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 offers numerous benefits for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Enhanced Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers exceptional power output while minimizing energy consumption, extending your working time per charge.
  • Precise Control: Variable speed control and an electric brake enable precise operation for different materials and applications.
  • Improved Durability: Built with high-quality components and a robust construction, this grinder is designed to withstand demanding use.
  • Increased Safety: The electric brake feature provides quick stopping power, enhancing safety during operation.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Cutting metal, stone, and other hard materials.
  • Grinding surfaces smooth for various projects.
  • Removing rust and paint from metal surfaces.
  • Sharpening tools and edges.

Always follow the manufacturer's instructions and safety guidelines when operating this tool. Wear appropriate personal protective equipment, including eye protection, gloves, and hearing protection.

description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile cordless angle grinder designed for tackling a wide range of tasks. Its brushless motor delivers high performance and extended runtime, while the compact and lightweight design ensures comfortable handling.

  • Brushless Motor: Provides increased power and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • 6 Speed Settings: Allows for precise speed control based on the application.
  • 125mm Disc Size: Accommodates a variety of grinding, cutting, and polishing discs.
  • Cordless Design: Offers freedom of movement and portability.

Specifications

This powerful angle grinder is built with robust specifications for demanding applications.

  • Voltage: 18V
  • No-Load Speed: High RPM range suitable for various tasks
  • Disc Size: 125mm
  • Spindle Thread: Standard M14 thread for disc attachment.

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 offers several key benefits that make it a valuable tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Increased Power & Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers more power and runtime than brushed motors, allowing you to complete tasks faster.
  • Versatility: With 6 speed settings and a 125mm disc size, this grinder can handle a wide range of applications, from cutting metal to grinding concrete and polishing surfaces.
  • Convenience & Portability: The cordless design provides freedom of movement and eliminates the hassle of cords.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 is suitable for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Grinding metal, concrete, stone, and other materials.
  • Cutting through various materials such as metal pipes, tiles, and wood.
  • Polishing surfaces to achieve a smooth finish.

The Makita DDF487 is engineered for performance. It operates on a 18V battery system, providing ample power for demanding applications. Its compact design and ergonomic grip enhance user comfort during extended use.

The Makita DDF487 is ideal for a wide range of applications in both professional and DIY settings. Use it to drill holes in various materials, drive screws with increased torque, assemble furniture, repair projects, and more. Always wear appropriate safety gear when operating power tools.
